remarks: If all the terms of two finite products are nonnegative and compare, so do the two products.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
fprodle.kph $e |- F/ k ph $.
fprodle.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fprodle.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. RR ) $.
fprodle.0l3b $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> 0 <_ B ) $.
fprodle.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> C e. RR ) $.
fprodle.blec $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B <_ C ) $.
fprodle $p |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. A B <_ prod_ k e. A C ) $.
$d A k $.
